query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		notificationdocument {
			database_id,
			id,
			notification {
				_id,
				activity_id,
				actor_name,
				affected_names,
				amount,
				avatar,
				award_amount,
				award_amount_lead,
				bonus_amount,
				created_at,
				custom_message,
				end_time,
				expiration_date,
				group_name,
				id,
				is_internal,
				is_user_first_to_agree,
				message,
				new_vpn_state,
				old_award_amount,
				old_award_amount_lead,
				old_team_name,
				pentest_check_name,
				pentest_end,
				pentest_name,
				pentest_start,
				pentest_timezone,
				readable_closing_substate,
				report_i_am_subscribed,
				report_id,
				report_state,
				report_substate,
				report_title,
				start_time,
				target_username,
				team_name,
				team_submission_state,
				timestamp,
				type,
				unread,
				url,
			},
			unread,
		}
	}
